content.content: 跌倒是美國醫院最常報告的成人不良事件。[^98] ![fall out of bed](//images.ctfassets.net/xbvvg00rroa3/wJZBv2QU06eKcLp05Emvd/4ba0dd3d8e36aaac13128f6421b8039b/fall_out_of_bed.jpg) 美國每年約有11,000名住院病人死於跌倒。[^99] ### 預防跌倒: Embedded content: https://youtu.be/MhPFCRLevY0 1\. 全天候有人陪伴病人。如果病人有跌倒的風險，不要讓他們獨自一人。[^7] Embedded content: https://youtu.be/GvX0AYUqeI0?list=LL31GglpqkW9B1NW8eHUZ-CA 2\. 起床前呼叫他人尋求幫助。使用呼叫燈。如果您感到頭暈、困倦或不對勁，請不要步行。[^7] ![Call light](//images.ctfassets.net/xbvvg00rroa3/4CdrMBsvYQemEkGW06AAqk/6bf5524a457e19aba2aeff90f846e5cc/Call_light.jpg) 3\. 在醫師允許的情況下，盡快安全地移動病人。讓病人穿上防滑拖鞋或合腳的鞋子。如果您或您所愛的人想步行去洗手間，請清除房間內的障礙物。如果有需要，請確保病人可以使用助行器或手杖等輔助設備。[^7] ![walkers](https://cdn2.hubspot.net/hub/114266/file-16410688-png/images/c--documents_and_settings-ninar-desktop-walkers_and_assistive_devices_sm.png) 4\. 睡前脫下穿在襪子外面的拖鞋，因為它們會沾染地板上的病菌。[^7] Embedded content: https://youtu.be/tx3Oc0SIZnI __使用「醫院護理計畫表」來代表您所愛的人，並詢問有關他們的問題。__ [醫院護理計畫表](https://patientsafetymovement.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/POC-Blank-April-19.pdf) [遠程醫療指南](https://patientsafetymovement.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Guide-to-Medical-Care-at-a-Distance.pdf) [跌倒](https://www.nlm.nih.gov/medlineplus/falls.html) [Senior Living提供的「為老年人打造更安全的世界」](https://www.seniorliving.org/research/injury-prevention-guide/) [^7]: Hallisey J. The Empowered Patient® hospital guide for patients and families. Empowered Patient website. http://engagedpatients.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/empowered_patient_hospital_guide.pdf. Published 2009. Updated 2012. Accessed May 10, 2015. [^98]: Brown CJ, Friedkin RJ, Inouye SK. Prevalence and outcomes of low mobility in hospitalized older patients. *J Am Geriatr Soc* 2004 Aug;52(8):1263-70. doi: 10.1111/j.1532-5415.2004.52354.x Accessed on November 3, 2020. [^99]: Currie LM, Fall and injury prevention. Patient Safety & Quality, An Evidence-based Handbook for Nurses. Rochelle, MD: Agency for Healthcare Research & Quality; 2008:195-250. AHRQ Publication No. 08-0043. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK2653/pdf/ch10.pdf. Accessed on May 8, 2015.
